original_text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.
korean_text: 이러므로 너희가 어두운 데서 말한 모든 것이 광명한 데서 들리고 너희가 골방에서 귀에 대고 말한 것이 지붕 위에서 전파되리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희가 어둠 속에서 말한 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: shall be heard in the light
and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 골방에서 귀에 속삭인 모든 것도

sentences.original_text: shall be proclaimed upon the housetops
